SELECT `articleID`, `title`, `userID`, `state`,`articleGroupID`, `privacy`,`contents`, `regionID`, `unitID`, DATE_FORMAT(postedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as postedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastEditedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastEditedDate, DATE_FORMAT(deletedTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as deletedTime FROM article WHERE privacy <= #{privacy} AND state = 0
AND articleID < #{lastItemID} order by postedDate desc
AND articleID > #{lastItemID} order by postedDate
limit #{size} ;

SELECT `articleID`, `title`, `userID`, `state`,`articleGroupID`, `privacy`,`contents`, `regionID`, `unitID`, DATE_FORMAT(postedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as postedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastEditedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastEditedDate, DATE_FORMAT(deletedTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as deletedTime FROM article WHERE (articleGroupID=#{articleGroupID} AND #{privacy} >= privacy AND state = 0)
AND articleID < #{lastItemID} order by postedDate desc
AND articleID > #{lastItemID} order by postedDate
limit #{size} ;

SELECT `articleID`, `title`, `userID`, `state`,`articleGroupID`, `privacy`,`contents`, `regionID`, `unitID`, DATE_FORMAT(postedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as postedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastEditedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastEditedDate, DATE_FORMAT(deletedTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as deletedTime FROM article WHERE articleID = #{articleID};
